key.name: num-columns
key.description: Number of columns of workspaces. Total number of workspaces must not be more than 36.

key.name: num-rows
key.description: Number of rows of workspaces. Total number of workspaces must not be more than 36.

key.name: wraparound
key.summary: Whether to wrap around when navigating workspaces.
key.description: Whether to wrap from (say) the end of the row back to the front of the row when navigating workspaces (e.g. with the keybindings)

key.name: relative-workspace-switching
key.summary: Whether to navigate to relative workspace indexes within row.
key.description: Whether to use absolute (e.g. 1-36) navigation to specific workspace or relative to current row (e.g. when on workspace 15, navigation to workspace 1 switches to workspace 11) when navigating workspaces (e.g. with the keybindings)

key.name: wrap-to-same
key.summary: Whether to wrap to the *same* row/col or the next/previous one if wraparound is enabled.
key.description: If the wraparound setting is enabled, should we wrap to the *same* row/col or the next/previous row/col when we wrap? E.g. if we are trying to navigate right from the top-right-most workspace, do we wrap the the leftmost workspace on the same row, or the leftmost workspace on the next row?

key.name: wrap-to-same-scroll
key.summary: Whether to wrap to the *same* row/col or the next/previous on scrolling one if warp-to-same is enabled.
key.description: If the warp-to-same setting is enabled, should we wrap to the *same* row/col or the next/previous row/col during scrolling when we wrap? E.g. if we are trying to navigate right from the top-right-most workspace, do we wrap the the leftmost workspace on the same row, or the leftmost workspace on the next row?

key.name: show-workspace-labels
key.summary: Whether to show workspace names in the workspace switcher popup
key.description: Whether to show workspace names in the workspace switcher popup

key.name: max-screen-fraction
key.summary: Maximum fraction of the screen workspace thumbnails are allowed to take up in the overview.
key.description: Maximum (horizontal) fraction of the screen the workspace thumbnails are allowed to take up in the overview.

key.name: max-screen-fraction-before-collapse
key.summary: Maximum fraction of the screen workspace thumbnails may take up before collapsing in the overview.
key.description: Maximum (horizontal) fraction of the screen the workspace thumbnails are allowed to take up in the overview before the workspace thumbnail box intialised collapsed (hover to open).

key.name: scroll-direction
key.summary: The direction that scroll event follows
key.description: The direction that scroll event follows.
